contentfulProduct.title: Lightweight Premium Down Comforter
contentfulProduct.subtitle: Traditional retail price $250

content.value: Our lightweight down comforter is made in the USA and features classic white down fill with 650 fill power. The loops on every corner will keep it in place and the sewn through construction will keep it fluffy and evenly distributed. Perfect for summer months and warm climates.
Classic white down fill with 100% cotton sateen shell
Responsible Down Standard Certified
Sewn through construction provides lightweight down comforter extra breathability for hot sleepers or warm climates
Corner loops to tie duvet and keep cover in place
Made in the USA of imported materials
Machine wash in cold water, gentle cycle. Use mild detergents only. Tumble dry on lowest heat setting until completely dry. Option to professionally dry clean.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Classic white down fill with 100% cotton sateen shell
  • Responsible Down Standard Certified
  • Sewn through construction provides lightweight down comforter extra breathability for hot sleepers or warm climates
  • Corner loops to tie duvet and keep cover in place
  • Made in the USA of imported materials

productDescription.productDescription: Our lightweight down comforter is made in the USA and features classic white down fill with 650 fill power. The loops on every corner will keep it in place and the sewn through construction will keep it fluffy and evenly distributed. Perfect for summer months and warm climates.
